NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Profile
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: A specification associated to a device to collect information about a certain Property (e.g., Energy) or Commodity (e.g.Water) for optimizing its usage in the home, office or building in which the device is located. This specification is about a certain Property or Commodity (saref:isAbout), can be calculated over a time span (saref:hasTime ) and can be associated to some costs (saref:hasPrice). An example is the Power Profile defined in the SAREF4ENER extension that can be associated to a device for optimizing the Energy efficiency in the home, office or building in which the device is located.
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Profile

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Smart contract
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Computer program or a transaction protocol which is intended to automatically execute, control or document legally relevant events and actions according to the terms of a contract or an agreement
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Smart contract

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Relationship between a grid violation and the DR request to solve it.
requests
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Relationship between a grid violation and the DR request to solve it.
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: requests

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Customer
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Entity that interacts in the platform

cluster name
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Name of a cluster
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: cluster name

has granularity
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Granularity of the profile (e.g., weekly, daily)
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has granularity

has reliability

sector name

has duration

NamedIndividual.shacl:description: A quality of a feature of interest that can be measured; an aspect of a feature of interest that is intrinsic to and cannot exist without the feature

NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Monetary value associated to a contract

is requested to

has currency
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Link between a price and its currency
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has currency

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: quantifies KPI
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: quantifies KPI
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: quantifies KPI

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: has smart contract
link between the Virtual node and its smart contracts
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: link between the Virtual node and its smart contracts
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has smart contract

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: FEID
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: An intelligent device, responsible for collecting information stemming from the field devices (home appliances, distributed energy resources, storage components etc.) to the DELTA Virtual Nodes and facilitate end-to-end communication of signals from/to the Aggregator and to/from the field devices. FEIDs will be equipped with smart meters measuring energy related data (e.g. consumption, generation, emissions, power coefficient, etc.) and through an intelligent lightweight toolkit compute real-time flexibility, providing them as input to the DVN Agent using fog computing techniques, aligned to a strategy (i.e. time interval) imposed to the specific Node by the Aggregator.
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: FEID

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Relation between a smart contract and the payment associated
has payment
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Relation between a smart contract and the payment associated
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has payment

includes profile
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Relationship between a violation and a profile that describes such violation
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: includes profile

NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Action that is requested by a FEID

isAbout

NamedIndividual.shacl:description: A temporal entity with zero extent or duration

NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Link between the customers and the devices

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Price
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: A saref:Property crelated to some measurements that are characterized by a certain value that is measured using saref:Currency
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Price

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Device
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: A tangible object designed to accomplish a particular task in households, common public buildings or offices. In order to accomplish this task, the device performs one or more functions. For example, a washing machine is designed to wash (task) and to accomplish this task it performs a start and stop function. Devices can be structured in categories (subclasses) that reflect the different domain in which a device is used, e.g., smart appliances domain (subclass FunctionRelated) vs. building domain (subclass BuildingRelated) vs. smart grid domain (subclass EnergyRelated). New categories can be defined,if needed, to reflect other differences, for example different points of view, such as the point of view of the device's user vs. the point of view of the device's manufacturer. We propose a list of devices that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended.
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Device

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: DR type that is implemented by the FEID, which can be implicit or explicit
implements DR type
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: DR type that is implemented by the FEID, which can be implicit or explicit
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: implements DR type

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Virtual node
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: An aggregated, virtual cluster of prosumers which will be perceived and acted upon as a single, large prosumer entity by the Aggregator. Prosumers entailed into each Virtual Node will have common characteristics, defined by their corresponding Aggregator.
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Virtual node

has aggregated property

NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has aggregated property

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Unit of measure
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: The unit of measure is a standard for measurement of a quantity, such as a Property. For example, Power is a property and Watt is a unit of power that represents a definite predetermined power: when we say 10 Watt, we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined power called \"watt\". Our definition is based on the definition of unit of measure in the Ontology of units of Measure (OM). We propose here a list of some units of measure that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended, also using some other ontologies rather than the Ontology of units of Measure (OM).
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: Unit of measure

NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Link to the delivery time
has delivery time
NamedIndividual.shacl:description: Link to the delivery time
NamedIndividual.shacl:name: has delivery time
